r.d: The class allows you to: * check if an address is an IPv6 address * compress/uncompress IPv6 addresses * check for an IPv4 compatible ending in an IPv6 address * check the assigned address space of an IPv6 address * do netmask calculations
r.n: #18687 Add recommendedFormat() provided by Tetsuji Koyama to respect RFC5952 about shortening of 0-Byte segments. The method may become a part of compress() in a stable release. #18976 Rok Potocnik spotted a missing range check for the netmask value while checking an IPv6 address.
